# db_query Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-02-01

## Active Technologies
- Python 3.12+（后端，使用实现时的最新稳定版）, Node.js 22+（前端工具链） + FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, sqlglot[rs], Ollama, React 18+, refine, Ant Design, Tailwind, Monaco Editor (001-db-query-mvp)
- PostgreSQL 与 MariaDB（业务数据源），SQLite（元数据/历史缓存：./db_query/db_query.db） (001-db-query-mvp)

- [e.g., Python 3.11, Swift 5.9, Rust 1.75 or NEEDS CLARIFICATION] + FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, sqlglot[rs], Ollama, React 18+, refine, Ant Design, Tailwind, Monaco Editor (001-db-query-mvp)
